com.foreach.across.core

Class EmptyAcrossModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.AbstractAcrossEntity
      • com.foreach.across.core.AcrossModule
        • com.foreach.across.core.EmptyAcrossModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcrossEntity, AcrossModuleEntity

    public final class EmptyAcrossModule
extends AcrossModule
    Default empty AcrossModule with a configurable name. This module does not do anything by default, but can be used to inject in an AcrossContext to satisfy dependencies.

    Optionally a set of annotated classes can be added that should be loaded in this module.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

        protected void registerDefaultInstallerContextConfigurers(Set<ApplicationContextConfigurer> installerContextConfigurers)
        Description copied from class: AcrossModule
        Register the default ApplicationContextConfigurer to be added to the global installer ApplicationContext for this module. This defaults to the "installers.config" package relative to the package of the implementing class.
